products.title: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £9.85 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home.
This soft Rosewood Pink roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. The soft dusty rosewood pink fabric will work beautifully with natural wooden tones throughout the home. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control.
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.This pink roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.productdescription:
Simple, soft and warm, our Bella Blackout Blush Pink panel blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money.  
 
Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our panel blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our panel blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

products.title: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink Electric Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £140.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home. 
 
 This Rosewood Pink electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electirc roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  The dusty rosewood pink of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and cool modern grey shades will benefit from a splash of colour with this fabric. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This purple roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
